summary: A small mod that adds my first character, Pamun, as a follower.
descriptionHtml: This is a small, novelty mod I made for myself that adds Pamun, the first character I ever made in the game, as a follower. You can find him in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. This mod only uses assets found in the vanilla game, so it doesn't require any DLCs and will be affected by any follower-tweaking mods you install.
author: Poppamunz
